english.segment1: Good evening. Lovely evening. A perfect evening. For a stroll on the town. Couples on the boardwalk. And down on the sandbar. Holding hands, staring out. To the moon on the ocean. Silver and soft. Water in motion
english.segment2: Car lights. Pacific Highway. We look both ways. My baby and me. We find a fancy restaurant. A table outside. In a quiet corner, please. Wind in the palm trees. Candles and wine. Her clear blue eyes. We stay till closing
english.segment3: Come on, my love. We can walk home. Past the dancers. And the bands winding down. Remind me again. What's the question?. We belong here. In this California town
english.segment4: Slow fade of summer. Stars in the sky. Songs in the night. The boom of the breakers
english.segment5: The pull of the tide. The swell and the sigh. Salt in the sea spray
